body_html: @yzhwang Hi, sorry for my digression, I'm more or less done with other works and will be working on tuning this patch now. As explained in my previous comment, can you share your performance results on the P100 machine so that I can cross-check whether my driver is interfering with the results? (It has been in the past).

body: @yzhwang Hi, sorry for my digression, I'm more or less done with other works and will be working on tuning this patch now. As explained in my previous comment, can you share your performance results on the P100 machine so that I can cross-check whether my driver is interfering with the results? (It has been in the past).
